mapper.select: SELECT SUM(W.WARE_QTY) "wareQty" , SUM(W.WARE_PRICE) "warePrice" , W.S_ID "sId" , UPPER(W.ST_PAY_METHOD) "stPayMethod" , S.ST_NAME "stName" FROM WAREHOUSING W, STOCK S , STOREOPEN SOP WHERE W.ST_NUM = S.ST_NUM AND W.S_ID = #{sId} AND W.WARE_DATE BETWEEN (SELECT MAX(OPENTIME) FROM STOREOPEN) AND NVL(SOP.CLOSETIME,SYSTIMESTAMP) AND W.WARE_QTY > 0 AND W.WARE_PRICE > 0 GROUP BY W.S_ID, W.ST_PAY_METHOD ,S.ST_NAME ORDER BY S.ST_NAME

SELECT DISTINCT O.S_ID , TOTAL , RECEIPT , PAY_METHOD , MILEAGE , TO_CHAR(O_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') FROM ORDERS O JOIN STOREOPEN SOP ON O.S_ID = SOP.S_ID WHERE O_DATE BETWEEN (SELECT MAX(OPENTIME) FROM STOREOPEN) AND NVL(SOP.CLOSETIME,SYSTIMESTAMP) AND O.S_ID = #{sId} AND UPPER(PAY_METHOD) = 'CASH' AND O.DELIVERY_STATUS = 'C3' AND TOTAL > 0
SELECT S_ID , DEFAULT_CASH , OPENTIME , CLOSETIME FROM STOREOPEN WHERE S_ID = #{sId} AND OPENTIME IN (SELECT MAX(OPENTIME) FROM STOREOPEN)
SELECT ST_NUM , S_ID , ST_NAME , ST_QTY , ST_AQTY , CA_NUM , ST_STATUS , LACK_QTY FROM STOCK WHERE S_ID = #{sId}

SELECT O.RECEIPT "receipt" , O.PAY_METHOD "payMethod" , SUM(O.TOTAL) "total" , count(*) "cnt" FROM ORDERS O JOIN STOREOPEN SOP ON O.S_ID = SOP.S_ID WHERE O.O_DATE BETWEEN SOP.OPENTIME AND SOP.CLOSETIME AND ( (O.RECEIPT='delivery' AND O.DELIVERY_STATUS ='C3') OR ( O.RECEIPT = 'takeout' AND O.DELIVERY_STATUS = 'C3' ) ) AND O.S_ID = #{sId} AND O.TOTAL > 0 GROUP BY O.RECEIPT, O.PAY_METHOD

SELECT SUM(O.MILEAGE) "mileage" , SUM(O.TOTAL)*0.01 "addmileage" , SUM(O.TOTAL) "total" , COUNT(*) "addMileageCnt" , COUNT(CASE WHEN MILEAGE > 0 THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) "minusMileageCnt" FROM ORDERS O ,(SELECT CLOSETIME, OPENTIME FROM STOREOPEN WHERE S_ID = #{sId} AND TRUNC(OPENTIME) = #{openTime}) SOP WHERE ( O.O_DATE BETWEEN SOP.OPENTIME AND NVL(SOP.CLOSETIME,SYSTIMESTAMP)) AND ( (O.RECEIPT='delivery' AND O.DELIVERY_STATUS ='C3') OR ( O.RECEIPT = 'takeout' AND O.DELIVERY_STATUS = 'C3' ) ) AND O.S_ID = #{sId} AND O.TOTAL > 0

SELECT SUM(TOTAL) "refundSum" , SUM(MILEAGE) "refundMileage" , PAY_METHOD "refundMethod" , COUNT(CASE WHEN MILEAGE > 0 THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) "mileage" , COUNT(CASE WHEN PAY_METHOD = 'cash' THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) "cashRefundCnt" , COUNT(CASE WHEN PAY_METHOD = 'card' THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) "cardRefundCnt" FROM ORDERS O JOIN STOREOPEN SOP ON O.S_ID = SOP.S_ID WHERE O.O_DATE BETWEEN SOP.OPENTIME AND SOP.CLOSETIME AND O.TOTAL < 0 AND O.S_ID = #{sId} GROUP BY PAY_METHOD

INSERT INTO WAREHOUSING ( WARE_NUM , WARE_DATE , WARE_QTY , WARE_PRICE , ST_NUM , S_ID , ST_PAY_METHOD , ST_LOSS ) SELECT 'WH'||LPAD(WARE_SEQ.NEXTVAL,4,0), A.* FROM(
SELECT SYSDATE ,#{item.wareQty} AS WARE_QTY ,#{item.warePrice} AS WARE_PRICE ,#{item.stName} AS ST_NUM ,#{item.sId} AS S_ID ,#{item.stPayMethod} AS ST_PAY_METHOD ,0 AS ST_LOSS FROM DUAL ) A

INSERT INTO WAREHOUSING ( WARE_NUM , WARE_DATE , WARE_QTY , WARE_PRICE , ST_NUM , S_ID , ST_LOSS ) SELECT 'WH'||LPAD(WARE_SEQ.NEXTVAL,4,0), A.* FROM(
SELECT SYSDATE ,0 AS WARE_QTY ,0 AS WARE_PRICE ,#{item.stNum} AS ST_NUM ,#{item.sId} AS S_ID ,#{item.stLoss} AS ST_LOSS FROM DUAL ) A

update.foreach: UPDATE STOREOPEN SET CLOSETIME = SYSTIMESTAMP, CASH = #{item.cash}, OR_CASH = #{item.orCash}, DIFFERENCE = #{item.difference}, NET_INCOME = #{item.netIncome} WHERE TO_CHAR(OPENTIME,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24MI') = #{item.openTime}
